author: Jonnie Long
description: A tropical fruit-laced aged agricol Ti' Punch with a touch of bittersweet Italian attitude.
name: Cyrano
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Martinique agricole rhum vieux (extra aged)
22.5 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: Cut a large coin-sized lime zest twist disc thick cut so also has flesh of the fruit (Ti' Punch-style) and MUDDLE on base of glass
Add other ingredients, fill glass with ice and briefly stir
